item.name: 31. >*< SUPP GND WING ANTI-ICE PANEL SWITCH
item.ttsname: Supplemental ground wing anti-ice panel switch

item.name: 63. FMS FLT PLN/WIND UPDATE/PERF
item.ttsname: FMS flight plan, wind update, perf

item.name: 70. CABIN LIGHTS/WATER HEATERS/MSTR SEAT
item.ttsname: Cabin lights, water heaters, master seat

item.name: TO BE USED FOR QUICK TURN WHEN APU HAS NOT BEEN
FOR USE WITH APU START ONLY
FOR CROSS BLEED OR EXTERNAL AIR START REFER TO
NOTE: ITT BELOW 120C & 20% N2 MIN FOR START
UNTIL ITT IS REDUCED BELOW 120C (MAXIMUM 90 SECONDS)
IF TAXIING TO DE-ICE, PAUSE CHECKLIST HERE
UNTIL PAPER DE-ICE CHECKLIST IS COMPLETE
item.ttsname: If taxiing to de-ice, pause checklist here until paper de-ice checklist is complete
